projects.name: 99nightsguide.com
projects.description: Live game guide website for 99 Nights in the Forest (Roblox). Monetization: Patreon only (kid-friendly, no AdSense/Affiliates). Site fully deployed and functional.
projects.revenueModel: Patreon membership (https://patreon.com/PrintedPixels) + future Mailchimp newsletter sponsorships
nextSteps: Set up Mailchimp newsletter signup form on site
Create initial Patreon tiers and content
Add more game content (new updates, strategies)
SEO monitoring — check Google Search Console indexing

milestones.event: Site built and deployed to Vercel
Patreon button fixed, AdSense removed (kid compliance), Amazon disclaimer removed

projects.name: Be A Fish In A Tank (Roblox)
projects.description: Multiplayer fish tank game: eat food, grow, compete. Design decisions MADE — GoldenShark removed (pay-to-win), no hunger system, soft progression. Ready for Studio testing.
projects.revenueModel: Robux game passes + cosmetic skins (no pay-to-win)
nextSteps: Studio testing: spawn rates, XP curves, PvP balance

milestones.event: Balance audit complete, decision document created
Design decisions made (A/A/A): GoldenShark removed, no hunger, soft progression

documents: PHASE2_DECISIONS_FINAL.md — All 3 decisions documented with rationale

projects.name: PrintedPixels.shop — 3D Print E-Commerce
projects.description: 3D printing e-commerce shop. Domain: PrintedPixels.shop. Niche: Tabletop Gaming Miniatures. CAD tool research in progress.
blockers: Custom domain DNS setup at IONOS (Jason's side)
nextSteps: Install Blender and complete first miniature model (CAD tool decided: Blender)
Set up e-commerce platform on PrintedPixels.shop
Configure custom domain DNS at IONOS

milestones.event: X/Twitter account created, CAD research started
CAD tool decided: Blender (report: CAD_TOOL_RESEARCH.md). Next.js upgraded to 16, deployed to Vercel.

projects.name: Project Tracker Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time dashboard tracking all projects. Auto-deploys from GitHub to Vercel. Live at tracker.99nightsguide.com.

milestones.event: GitHub auto-deploy set up, custom domain configured
